str:translations.str:about_feeds: This is a web feed, also known as an Atom feed. Subscribe by copying the URL from the address bar into your newsreader. Visit About Feeds to learn more and get started. It's free.

feed.title: VITAmin - FAQ
feed.subtitle: tabi is a fast, lightweight, and modern Zola theme with multi-language support, optional JavaScript, and a perfect Lighthouse score.

entry.title: Mastering tabi Settings: A Comprehensive Guide
entry.summary: Discover the many ways you can customise your tabi site.

entry.title: Lost in Translation? Not with tabi's Multilingual Capabilities
entry.summary: Master the art of serving a global audience through tabi's built-in multilingual features. Learn how to change the default language, add multilingual support, and contribute your own translations.
